title: Leauge Client Not Being Able to Patch.
body:
Alright so one day I was playing LoL and having fun suddenly *insert meme* an error appears "League of Legends has lost connection". So I check my internet everything was fine. I disable my firewall and I restart League. Then it tells me if I have to repair my client soo I let it repair it self. While its repairing I'm using my phone then League crashes. Keeps happening I tried taking the easy route by uninstalling LoL and reinstall it * note I install League on a usb drive since my computer is like 10 gb of free space I know right I'm poor* for some reason every time I trying installing Lol the drive goes corrupt and suspends and disconnects it self from the computer. So I googled a solution to the disconnection problem and it worked but the only thing that makes my usb automatically disconnect is LoL installer. I tried installing photoshop on it and it worked perfectly fine.

here is some logs from event viewer 


Log Name:      Application
Source:        Application Error
Date:          12/7/2017 9:32:40 PM
Event ID:      1000
Task Category: (100)
Level:         Error
Keywords:      Classic
User:          N/A
Computer:      JASIELWIN
Description:
Faulting application name: LeagueClientUx.exe, version: 0.0.0.0, time stamp: 0x5a0b8b92
Faulting module name: libcef.dll, version: 0.0.0.0, time stamp: 0x58a39fbe
Exception code: 0xc0000006
Fault offset: 0x00576bd0
Faulting process id: 0x13dc
Faulting application start time: 0x01d36fcc05fb4bda
Faulting application path: E:\LoL\RADS\projects\league_client\releases\installer\deploy\LeagueClientUx.exe
Faulting module path: E:\LoL\RADS\projects\league_client\releases\installer\deploy\libcef.dll
Report Id: 5098338e-0810-4429-8dfd-e07ed65798ed
Faulting package full name: 
Faulting package-relative application ID: 

Faulting application name: LeagueClient.exe, version: 0.0.0.0, time stamp: 0x5a0b8b9b
Faulting module name: rcp-be-patcher.dll, version: 0.0.0.0, time stamp: 0x5a060001
Exception code: 0xc0000006
Fault offset: 0x000fca60
Faulting process id: 0x110c
Faulting application start time: 0x01d36fcc04f1422a
Faulting application path: E:\LoL\RADS\projects\league_client\releases\installer\deploy\LeagueClient.exe
Faulting module path: E:\LoL\RADS\projects\league_client\releases\installer\deploy\Plugins\rcp-be-patcher\rcp-be-patcher.dll
Report Id: 92ccd521-d200-4d30-9a28-26b12e359662
Faulting package full name: 
Faulting package-relative application ID: 

Windows cannot access the file  for one of the following reasons: there is a problem with the network connection, the disk that the file is stored on, or the storage drivers installed on this computer; or the disk is missing. Windows closed the program LeagueClientUx.exe because of this error.

Program: LeagueClientUx.exe
File: 

The error value is listed in the Additional Data section.
User Action
1. Open the file again. This situation might be a temporary problem that corrects itself when the program runs again.
2. If the file still cannot be accessed and
	- It is on the network, your network administrator should verify that there is not a problem with the network and that the server can be contacted.
	- It is on a removable disk, for example, a floppy disk or CD-ROM, verify that the disk is fully inserted into the computer.
3. Check and repair the file system by running CHKDSK. To run CHKDSK, click Start, click Run, type CMD, and then click OK. At the command prompt, type CHKDSK /F, and then press ENTER.
4. If the problem persists, restore the file from a backup copy.
5. Determine whether other files on the same disk can be opened. If not, the disk might be damaged. If it is a hard disk, contact your administrator or computer hardware vendor for further assistance.

Additional Data
Error value: C000000E
Disk type: 0


I know some people are gonna tell me to run Chkdsk but ive already ran it still doesn't work. Ive Tried another usb drive the same thing happens.
I need urgent help I'm cringing to play some Yasuo and Katarina :'V.

replies.body: I know this isn't really the best answer that you're looking for, but League is only designed to run properly on the default C drive. You're gonna want to free up some space and install the game there install of a thumbdrive.
May still be having a problem uncompressing contents with such limited memory. Size of thumbdrive? computer RAM? Background application disconnecting thumbdrive? Running as administrator?
500 gbon the drive . 2.00 gb ram. I will try to run as administrator this time.
How large is the thumbdrive and how large is the update file you are trying to run?

> [{quoted}](name=Socodemon,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7ZOnbf5m,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-08T03:22:07.530+0000)
>
> How large is the thumbdrive and how large is the update file you are trying to run?

I tried as admin and the same thing happened

Thumb drive may be corrupted/damaged.

Try also using a Different USB port.

hmmmm.
may be having an issue considering the update is larger than available ram. Try to open up more free space on system hard drive to >20Gb

> [{quoted}](name=Socodemon,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7ZOnbf5m,comment-id=000000000000000100000000,timestamp=2017-12-08T04:00:11.372+0000)
>
> may be having an issue considering the update is larger than available ram. Try to open up more free space on system hard drive to >20Gb

Tried new port same problem. I tried chkdsk said the drive is working properly. Now I'm going to try and delete some apps and download the update. Will keep you posted.
The thumbdrive is 500 Gigabytes and the update is about 2440 mb but I haven't gone through reinstalling the game.
